TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit CharsetDecoder extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: An engine that can transform a sequence of bytes in a specific charset into a sequence of sixteen-bit Unicode characters.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

protected CharsetDecoder (Java.Nio.Charset.Charset? cs, float averageCharsPerByte, float maxCharsPerByte);
.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class Java.Nio.Charset.Charset cs, float32 averageCharsPerByte, float32 maxCharsPerByte) cil managed

Docs.param: The charset that created this decoder
A positive float value indicating the expected number of characters that will be produced for each input byte

Docs.summary: Returns the average number of characters that will be produced for each byte of input.
Docs.returns: The average number of characters produced per byte of input

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Java.Nio.Charset.Charset Charset() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the charset that created this decoder.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Java.Nio.CharBuffer Decode(class Java.Nio.ByteBuffer in) cil managed

Docs.summary: Convenience method that decodes the remaining content of a single input byte buffer into a newly-allocated character buffer.
Docs.returns: A newly-allocated character buffer containing the result of the decoding operation. The buffer's position will be zero and its limit will follow the last character written.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if another decoding operation is ongoing.
if an illegal input byte sequence for this charset was encountered, and the action for malformed error is

if a legal but unmappable input byte sequence for this charset was encountered, and the action for unmappable character error is . Unmappable means the byte sequence at the input buffer's current position cannot be mapped to a Unicode character sequence.
if another exception happened during the decode operation.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.Decode : Java.Nio.ByteBuffer * Java.Nio.CharBuffer * bool -> Java.Nio.Charset.CoderResult
public Java.Nio.Charset.CoderResult? Decode (Java.Nio.ByteBuffer? in, Java.Nio.CharBuffer? out, bool endOfInput);
.method public hidebysig instance class Java.Nio.Charset.CoderResult Decode(class Java.Nio.ByteBuffer in, class Java.Nio.CharBuffer out, bool endOfInput) cil managed

Docs.param: true if all the input characters have been provided.
Docs.summary: Convenience method that decodes the remaining content of a single input byte buffer into a newly-allocated character buffer.
Docs.returns: A newly-allocated character buffer containing the result of the decoding operation. The buffer's position will be zero and its limit will follow the last character written.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if decoding has started or no more input is needed in this decoding progress.
if the method threw an BufferUnderflowException or BufferOverflowException.

.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class Java.Nio.Charset.CoderResult DecodeLoop(class Java.Nio.ByteBuffer in, class Java.Nio.CharBuffer out) cil managed

Docs.summary: Decodes one or more bytes into one or more characters.
Docs.returns: A coder-result object describing the reason for termination

MemberSignature.Value: abstract member DetectedCharset : unit -> Java.Nio.Charset.Charset override this.DetectedCharset : unit -> Java.Nio.Charset.Charset
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Java.Nio.Charset.Charset DetectedCharset() cil managed

Docs.summary: Retrieves the charset that was detected by this decoder  (optional operation).
Docs.returns: The charset detected by this auto-detecting decoder, or null if the charset has not yet been determined

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if this decoder does not implement an auto-detecting charset.
if insufficient bytes have been read to determine the charset.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Java.Nio.Charset.CoderResult Flush(class Java.Nio.CharBuffer out) cil managed

Docs.summary: Flushes this decoder.
Docs.returns: A coder-result object, either CoderResult#UNDERFLOW or CoderResult#OVERFLOW

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if this decoder isn't already flushed or at end of input.
